texts.en: Sarvina is a young and smart woman. She is 20 years old. She is married, but does not have children yet. She has been working for over two years on a poultry farm as a aviculturist. Sarvina is a very honest woman and that's why her colleagues respect her. Sarvina is taking out the loan for the first time. She needs money because her mother is seriously ill. Sarvina does not have any savings to buy medicine to treat her mother. She is asking for a loan in the amount of 3,000 somoni to buy medicine. This loan will help improve her beloved mother's health. Sarvina is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy medicine for treatment of her beloved mother.

loans.name: Las Bellas Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias exitosas una de ellas es Ubenza mujer de 54 años de edad, soltera. Su negocio es venta de ropa, zapatos, accesorios sus productos los comercializa ambulante, en el mercado y su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de zapatos  cerrados  varón y  mujer, sandalias, chapas, cadenas, pulseras, anillos, blusas, faldas, pantalones. Brenda tiene 45 y su negocio es salón de belleza y Mariana mujer de 49 años su negocio es salón de belleza.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three successful members, one of which is Ubenza, a single 54-year-old woman. She works selling clothing, shoes, and accessories. She sells her products in the street, in her community's market. 

She is applying for this loan in order to buy closed-toe men's and women's shoes, sandals, earrings, chains, bracelets, rings, blouses, skirts, and pants. 

Brenda is 45 years old and works in a beauty salon, and Mariana is 49 years old and also works in a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy closed-toe men's and women's shoes, sandals, earrings, chains, bracelets, rings, blouses, skirts, and pants.

loans.name: Estoy Confiando Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Silvia mujer de 35 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 7 y 14 años de edad. Su negocio es venta de ropa usada desde hace 2 años. Tiene 1 año de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de pacas de ropa donde vienen camisas, pantalones de mujer y varón, shores, vestidos, bufandas, pantalones de vestir, etc. zelenia tiene 27 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cabeza de chancho y Victoria mujer de 53 años de edad y su negocio es venta de sopa.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three members, one of whom is Silvia.  She is 35, married and has two children, ages 7 and 14.  For two years she has been selling used clothing for a living.  She has been a client of the institution's for a year.  The loan she is requesting is to buy packs of clothing containing shirts, men's and women's pants, shorts, dresses, scarves, dress pants, etc.  

Another member, Zelenia, is 27 and sells pork and Victoria, 53, sells soup.

loans.use: To buy packs of clothing containing shirts, men's and women's pants, shorts, dresses, scarves, dress pants, etc.

loans.name: Las Sirenitas Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios uno de ellos es Agustina tiene 45 años de edad, casada, con 7 hijos dos de ellos a su cargo de 16 y 14  años. Su negocio es la venta de frutas variadas desde hace 4 años. Es  cliente de la institución desde hace 8 años y el crédito lo solicita para invertir en compra de inventario de frutas como banano, naranja, melón, papaya, cosecha de mamon y fletes de leña. Bismak tiene 40 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa en la zona franca y Ana mujer de 36 años y su negocio es la venta ambulante de frutas.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of three members, one of whom is Agustina who is 45, married and has seven children, two of whom are in her care, ages 16 and 14.  For four years she has been earning a living selling a variety of fruit.  For eight years she has been a client of the institution; and she plans to use the loan to buy fruit such as banana, orange, melon and papaya, and firewood.

The other two members are Bismak, 40, who sells clothing in the duty free zone and Ana, 36, who works as a street vendor selling fruit.

loans.use: To buy fruit such as banana, orange, melon, papaya, and firewood.

loans.name: Los Meneses Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado tres socias exitosas una de ellas es Migdalia mujer de 45 años de edad, casada con dos hijos de 19 y 14 años. Su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 8 años en su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para la compra por quintal de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, caja de jabón de lavar ropa, jabón de baño, pamper, cigarros, chiveras, etc. Ileana mujer de 40 años, su negocio crianza y venta de cerdo, frijoles cocidos, hielo, frescos y Julia tiene 52 años de edad y su negocio es venta de tortillas, fresco y helados.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three successful members, one of whom is Migdalia, 45, who is married and has two children, ages 19 and 14.  For eight years she has been running a grocery store in her community.  She is requesting a loan to buy 100 lbs. of rice, beans, sugar, a case of detergent, bath soap, disposable diaspers, cigarettes, yogurts, etc.

The other members are Ileana, 40, who raises and sells pigs, cooked beans and ice, and Julia, 52, who has a tortilla, soft drinks and ice cream business.

loans.use: To buy 100 lbs. of rice, beans, sugar, a case of detergent, bath soap, disposable diapers, cigarettes, yogurt, etc.

loans.name: Ideal Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Telma tiene 66 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo de 23 y  20 años de edad. Se dedica al negocio de vender frutas y verduras variadas desde hace 30 años. Sus productos los comercializa  en el mercado. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de chayote, ayote, zanahoria, remolacha, papa, naranja, banano, melón, etc. Tania mujer de 24 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de ropa típica y Irene mujer de 42 años su negocio taller de costura.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of three women entrepreneurs, one of whom is Telma, 66, who is married and has two children, ages 23 and 20, in her care.  She sells a variety of fruits and vegetables and has been in business for 30 years, working at the market.  She is requesting a loan to buy chayotes, pumpkins, carrots, beets, potatoes, oranges, bananas, melons, etc.

The other members of the group are Tania, 24, who sells regional clothing, and Irene, 42, who has a sewing business.

loans.use: To buy chayotes, pumpkins, carrots, beets, potatoes, oranges, bananas, melons, etc.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es: Juana es una mujer emprendedora exitosa de 44 años de edad, casada con un hijo menor de edad. Su negocio es pulpería, venta de ropa usada y nueva desde hace 18 años. Sus productos como la ropa nueva y usada la venden ambulante. El crédito lo invertirá en comprar bisutería tales como chapas, cadenas, collares, pulseras, anillos, aros, etc
texts.en:
Juana is a successful and entrepreneurial 44-year-old woman. She is married and has one younger child. Her businesses are in selling groceries and used and new clothing, which she has been doing for the past 18 years. She sells the new and used clothing on the street. 

She will invest this loan in the purchase of jewelry such as earrings, chains, necklaces, bracelets, rings, hoops, etc.

loans.use: to buy jewelry such as earrings, chains, necklaces, bracelets, rings, hoops, etc.

loans.name: El Arbol Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socias empresarias una de ellas es Mirna que es mujer de 34 años, acompañada, con dos hijos de 10, 18 años respectivamente, su negocio es tener una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace dos años y medios, anteriormente era ama de casa, su mama le ayuda en el negocio, en la atención de la clientela. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, productos  lácteos, sal, medicamentos populares, papel higiénico, productos tang, carne de res, carne de pollo, gaseosas variadas, bigcola, pan simple, pan dulce etc. Uno de los logros que adquirió con el crédito anterior es con sus utilidades hizo un muro perimetral en su domicilio que le da seguridad a su familia., Maritza tiene 40 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, Eugenia tiene 21 años su negocio es la venta de pozol, tistes, semilla de jícaro en bruto y Margot tiene 62 años y su negocio es la venta de sandalias.
texts.en: This group is made up of four businesswomen.  One of these members is 34-year-old Mirna.  She has a partner and two children, aged ten and eight years old.  Mirna has had a grocery store in her home for two and a half years.  Before starting this work, she was a housewife.  Mirna's mother helps her with the business, serving customers.  This loan will be used to buy basic products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, dairy products, salt, medicines, toilet paper, Tang products, meat, chicken, fizzy drinks, Cola, bread, sweet bread and more.  One thing that Mirna has managed as a result of previous loans is that she has built a wall around her home, providing her family with more security.  Martiza is 40 years old and has a business selling Avon cosmetics.  Eugenia is 21 years old and sells "posol" (a maize drink) and seeds for calabash tress.  Margot is 62 years old and has a business selling watermelons.

loans.use: to buy basic products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, dairy products, salt, medicines, toilet paper, Tang products, meat, chicken, fizzy drinks, Cola, bread, sweet bread and more.

loans.name: Yojana De Los Angeles

texts.es: Yojana es una mujer emprendedora de 36 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos  de 18, 14 y 6 años de edad. Su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 7 años. Tiene 1 año de ser cliente de esta institución. El crédito solicitado es para compra por quintal los granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico, jabón de baño, jabón de ropa, cigarros, chiverías, etc.
texts.en: Yojana is an entrepreneurial woman who is 36 years old, married, and has three children who are 18, 14, and 6 years old. She has run a grocery store for the past seven years. She has been a member of this institution for one year. The loan for which she is applying will be used to buy per hundredweight basic grains (such as rice), sugar, oil, toilet paper, bathroom soap, clothing soap, cigarettes, canned goods, etc.

loans.use: to buy per hundredweight basic grains (such as rice), sugar, oil, toilet paper, bathroom soap, clothing soap, cigarettes, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: El Cisne Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatros socias emprendedoras, así es el caso de Mirna mujer de 54 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos, se dedica a la hecha y venta de nacatamales desde hace 8 años que junto a su esposo ambos están inmerso en el negocio que les ha ayudado a sostener a  la familia, tiene dos años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito  lo quiere invertir en un nuevo negocio como es la venta de fritanga y materia prima para  la fritanga como carne de res, carne de pollo, plátanos verdes, plátanos maduros, aceite, tomate, chiltoma, cebollas, sal, arroz, azúcar, bolsas plásticas, y materia prima para los nacatamales como carne de cerdo, hojas de chagüites, sal, achiote, maíz, papa, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, ajo, mecate, leñas, cal etc. con el crédito anterior logro con sus utilidades en reparar el techo de su casa mejoras a su vivienda. Marisol tiene 44 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y calzados, Karla tiene 18 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, bisuterías y ropa nueva de adulto.
texts.en: This group is made up of four enterprising members, including 54-year-old Mirna.  She has a partner and four children and has been making a living producing and selling “nacatamales” (rice and corn wrapped in a banana leaf) for eight years.  Mirna, and her husband, have been immersed in this business which has helped them to support their family.  Mirna has been a member of the communal bank for two years and wants to invest this loan in a new business – a restaurant – and to buy supplies such as meat, chicken, green bananas, ripe bananas, oil, tomatoes, onion, salt, rice, sugar, plastic bags and supplies for making “nacatamales” such as pork, banana leaves, salt, annatto, corn, potatoes, tomatoes, onion, garlic, cord, firewood and more.  With her previous loan, Mirna used her profits to repair the roof in her house.  Marisol is 44 years old and has a business selling clothes and footwear.  Karla, 18 years old, has a business selling Avon products, costumer jewellery and new clothes for adults.

loans.use: to start a new business – a restaurant – and to buy supplies such as meat, chicken, green bananas, ripe bananas, oil, tomatoes, onion, salt, rice, sugar, plastic bags and supplies for making “nacatamales” (a rice and meat dish, wrapped in a banana leaf) such as pork, banana leaves, salt, annatto, corn, potatoes, tomatoes,  onion, garlic, cord, firewood and more.

loans.name: Nicole Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Liliam mujer de 47 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos su negocio es la venta de comida todos los días en su domicilio quien las vende a la comunidad, desde hace 10 años. Tiene ser cliente de la institución 6 años consecutivos y los créditos les ha servido para mantener y mejorar su negocio, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra en materia prima como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, carne de res, carne de pollo, pescado, sal, verduras, vegetales, plátano verde, plátano maduro, cremas, mantequillas, salsa de tomate, salsa inglesa, mayonesa, pimienta, tortillas, leñas etc. En el préstamo pasado con sus ganancias logro comprar dos peroles grandes para cocinar. Flor tiene 33 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de moronga, fritos, chicharrón en su domicilio y Rosa tiene 30 años y su negocio es la venta de frijoles cocidos, gaseosas, queso.
texts.en:
This group consists of three entrepreneurial members, one of whom is Liliam, a 47-year-old married woman with three children. She has worked selling food from her home every day to people in her community for the past 10 years. She has been a member of this group for six consecutive years and the loans have served her well in order to maintain and improve her business.

She will invest this loan in the purchase of raw materials such as rice, sugar, beans, oil, beef, chicken, fish, salt, vegetables, green and ripe bananas, cream, butter, tomato sauce, Worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, pepper, tortillas, firewood, etc. With the earnings she gained with her last loan, she was able to buy two large cooking pots. 

The other members of the group are Flor, who is 33 years old and sells blood sausage, fried foods, and pork rinds from her home, and Rosa, who is 30 years old and who sells cooked beans, soda, and cheese.

loans.use: purchase basic items such as rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, beef, and chicken, as well as kitchen utensils such as skewers, ladles, frying pans, etc.

loans.name: David Ernesto

texts.es:
David es un joven luchador de 21 años de edad, acompañado y padre de dos hijos. Desde hace 5 años se dedica a la reparación de motos y bicicletas; ya que nunca tubo la ayuda de su padre y a sido su madre quien se encargo de criarlo toda la vida.   El  oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica, ya que cerca de donde el vivía, estaba ubicado un pequeño taller, y todas las tardes llegaba a observar como era que realizaban las labores de trabajo. De esta manera al ver la insistencia  que el muchacho tenia, cierto día le dieron la oportunidad de dejarlo laborar en el taller. así  fue como aprendió y hace dos años coloco su propio taller, donde actualmente labora.  Con los pocos ingresos que obtiene compra los materiales en la ciudad, en una tienda reconocida en ventas al por mayor de repuestos y herramientas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar llantas de bicicletas y de moto, porque no tiene disponible para sus clientes solo las repara peor no teine a la venta para cambiarlas,  rines, quiere vender chasis de bicicletas de esto no vende en este momento. De esta manera,   mejorara y equipara su pequeño negocio. Ya que lo que quiere es poder brindar una mejor atención y servicio a sus clientes.

Dado a que va mejor las condiciones de su negocio e invertirá en la compra de mejor calidad de repuestos.  David espera atraer muchos mas clientes con los que cuenta actualmente, y así generar una mayor cantidad de ingresos, con los cuales espera darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.

Los planes de David  es primeramente cancelar el préstamo y seguir teniendo la oportunidad de nuevos prestamos en la institución. Otro es darle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria, ya que el nunca tubo esa posibilidad, debido a que no tubo la ayuda de su padre. Y desea poder ver  crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
David is a tenacious young man, 21 years old, with a partner and two children. For 5 years he has been repairing motorcycles and bicycles. He never had the help of his father, and it was his mother who raised him all his life. He learned the trade empirically, as near where he lived there was a small workshop, and every afternoon he went to watch how the work was done. Seeing the boy's persistence, one day they gave him the opportunity to work in the shop. This is how he learned, and two years ago he started his own workshop, where he now works. With the little income he earns, he buys materials in the city, at a shop known for wholesale parts and tools. 

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to purchase bicycle and motorcycle tires, because he does not have them available for his clients; he repairs them but does not have them for sale to be able to change them. He will also buy rims. He would like to sell bicycle frames, which he does not sell at the moment. This way, he will improve and equip his small business. What he wants is to be able to provide better service to his customers. 

Once his business conditions improve he will invest in the purchase of better quality replacement parts. David hopes to attract many more clients through those he currently has, and thus generate more income, with which he hopes to provide a better quality of life for his children. 

David's plan is first to pay off the loan and continue to have the opportunity for new loans with the institution. Another is to give his children the chance to get a university degree, since he never had that chance, due to the lack of assistance from his father. He would also like to see his business grow.

loans.use: to buy bicycle and motorcycle tires, rims, and bicycle frames

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en: Ammar is a 23-year-old who lives in Sana'a, Yemen. He sells fresh fruits and vegetables. He is hardworking man who works every day so that he can improve his living standards. He would like to expand his business, so he applied for a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy fruits and vegetables for his business. He hopes to own a farm to raise fruits and vegetables for resale, in order to increase his profits. He thanks the Kiva lenders for funding his first loan and hopes to be funded in this loan.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for his business.

loans.name: Yvonne

texts.en: Yvonne is 25 years old. She is married to a businessman and they have two children, 3 and 6 years old. She sells fruit and has been in the business for one year. With the loan, she would like to buy more fruit for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy fruit for sale

loans.name: Ndeye Yacine

texts.fr:
Madame Ndèye Yacine âgée de 32 ans, mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont l’ainé a 10 ans et le cadet 3 ans fait du commerce depuis 2008. Elle vient solliciter pour une 3ème fois un crédit de 150000F CFA  pour acheter des tissus, des pagnes et parfums afin de les revendre dans le marché local.
Elle n’a pas de charges qui l’encombre sinon ses propres charges. C’est pourquoi elle réussi tout de même à épargner et à payer correctement son crédit. Elle commence sa journé à 8h pour la terminer à 18h. Madame Ndèye Yacine souhaite à l'avenir augmenter ses revenus et diversifier ses activités
texts.en: Ndèye Yacine is 32 years old, married and the mother of 5 children, the eldest of whom is 10 years old and the youngest, 3. She has been doing business since 2008. She is requesting, for the third time, a loan of 150 000 francs with which to buy some fabrics, pagnes (highly decorative and colourful West African clothing) and perfumes, which she will resell at the local market. The only expenses she has to worry about are her own personal ones. This is why she still manages to save and to correctly repay her loans. She starts her workday at 8 am and finishes at 6pm. In future, Ndèye Yacine would like to increase her income and diversify her business.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and perfumes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes to sell

loans.name: Ndick

texts.fr:
Cela fait plus de 10 ans maintenant que monsieur Ndick évolue dans le commerce de bœufs. Son activité consiste à élever des bovins et à les revendre dans les marchés locaux. Il a une bonne expérience de son domaine d’activité. Il commence sa journée à 7h du matin pour la finir à 19h. 
Ndick est marié et père de famille ; il s’occupe des charges familiales et travaille pour mettre sa famille dans les meilleures conditions de vie.
Il rêve d’avoir un grand troupeau de bovins, caprins, ovins.
texts.en:
Ndick has been selling cows for more than ten years already. His business consists in raising cattle and reselling it at local markets.  He has a good experience in his field and he works from 7AM until 7PM.

Ndick is married and raising a family.  He takes care of his family's expenses and works in order to provide his family with the best possible living conditions.

His dream is to have a large herd (cows, goats and sheep).

loans.use: to buy cattle to raise and resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cooking utensils and fabric to resell

loans.name: Modou

texts.fr: Monsieur Modou est un homme célibataire qui  habite au Sénégal. Il s’active dans le secteur commercial particulièrement dans la vente de denrées alimentaires et de céréales locales. Cela fait pratiquement 07 ans qu’elle s’adonne à cette activité. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC où il sollicite un prêt de 250.000 francs CFA prévu pour le renforcement  de son  fond de roulement et aussi pour l’achat de produits alimentaires a revendre. Ce financement  servira à renforcer sa boutique en produits. Par conséquent, il pourra booster ses ventes et accroitre ses gains et ainsi parvenir a  épargner plus d’argent et renforcer encore plus son fonds de roulement. Il aspire à devenir un grand commerçant et avoir des maisons pour les mettre en  locations.
texts.en:
Modou is a single man who lives in Senegal. He works selling food products and local cereals. He has been doing this almost seven years. 

He is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches and is asking for a loan of 250,000 francs CFA to be used to increase his working capital and also to buy food products to resell. 

This financing will serve to increase his shop's stock. As a consequence of this, he can boost his sales and increase his earnings so that she can save money and once again increase his working capital. 

He dreams of becoming a large merchant and to have houses that he can rent out.

loans.use: to buy food products to resell

loans.name: Ouleye

texts.fr: Madame Ouleye vit au Sénégal. Elle est mère de deux enfants et elle exerce deux activités simultanément. En effet, elle fait de la coiffure et du commerce et les revenus qu’elle y obtient l’aide à subvenir à ses besoins personnels. Elle est membre  de  l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC qui l’a octroyé 04 crédits antérieurs. De nouveau, elle sollicite un prêt de 100.000 francs CFA pour acheter un réfrigérateur. Ce qui l’a vraiment poussé à mettre en œuvre ce projet est que le réfrigérateur qu’elle possède est trop petit pour satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. L’accès a ce financement lui permettra donc de vendre plus et par la même occasion d’augmenter ses revenus. Avec ses bénéfices, elle pourra apporter un soutien financier à ses frères et sœurs et contribuer à l’épanouissement de ses enfants. Elle ambitionne de faire de l’import et l’export de marchandises diverses.
texts.en:
Ouleye lives in Senegal. She is a mother of two children and she works two jobs simultaneously--as a hairdresser and a merchant. The income she earns helps her support her personal needs. 

She is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches, who has granted her four previous loans. She is asking for a new loan of 100,000 francs CFA in order to buy a refrigerator, because she cannot meet the needs of her customers with the one she has now. 

Access to this financing will allow her to sell more and thus increase her earnings, which she can use to help her brothers and sisters and also to take care of her children. 

She hopes to get into importing and exporting different types of merchandise.

loans.use: to buy a larger refrigerator

loans.name: Gie Takku Liggey Abattoirs Group

texts.fr:
Le GIE  Takku Liggey Abattoirs regroupe cinq femmes qui s’activent dans le commerce de divers. La présidente, la dame Salla âgée de la cinquantaine, évolue dans la vente de poissons séchés et fumés, activité qu’elle a démarrée depuis maintenant 5 ans avec ses propres moyens. Elle a démarré avec une très petite somme provenant d’une épargne personnelle.
Salla est mariée et mère de famille ; elle participe à la dépense quotidienne et appuie son mari dans les charges de la maison.
Elle désir agrandir son activité et la diversifier et elle compte sur les financements que lui octroieras l’IMCEC.
texts.en:
The Gie Takku Liggey Abattoirs group is made up of five women who engage in different types of commerce. The president, Salla, who is in her fifties, has been selling dried and smoked fish for five years--a business she started with her own small amount of savings. 

Salla is married and a mother of a family. She helps her husband take care of the household and contributes to the everyday expenses. 

Salla wants to expand and diversify her business and she relies on financing from UIMCEC [to help her do this].

loans.use: to buy dried and smoked fish to resell

loans.name: Oumy

texts.fr: Madame oumy est une commercante qui habite dans les environs du Guichet.Elle évolue dans la vente de tissus, bazins et des draps. Elle a une expérience de 7ans dans cet activité; Madame Oumy sollicite ce pret pour augmenter son marchandise. Elle commence sa journée à 10h pour la terminer à 17h. Oumy détient un cantine au marché et veut augmenter son stock de marchandise. A l'avenir elle souhaite avec l'aide de l'imcec augmenter ses revenus pour pouvoir diversifier sa marchandise
texts.en:
Oumy is a merchant who lives around one of the [UIMCEC] branches. She has been selling damask and other fabrics and sheets for seven years.

Oumy is asking for a loan to expand and increase her stock of merchandise. She works from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. at her stall in a market.

In the future, she wishes, with help from UIMCEC, to increase her earnings in order to diversify her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy damask and other fabric to resell

loans.name: Balle

texts.fr: Monsieur BALLE est éleveur de profession. Il est marié et père de famille; il est agé de 33 ans et habite à 7km du guichet; il a une expérience de 10ans dans cet activité. Monsieur BALLE sollicite ce crédit d'un montant de 600000F pour acheter des moutons, les élever et ensuite les revendre dans les marchés hebdomadaires et pendant les fêtes religieuses. Il commence sa journée à 6h du matin et la termine à 22h. A L'avenir Balle souhaite augmenter ses revenus pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Balle is 33 years old, married and a father of a family. He lives 7 kilometers from a branch [of UIMCEC]. Balle has been raising livestock for a living for ten years. He starts his day at six in the morning and finishes at ten at night.

Balle is asking for a loan of 600,000 francs to buy sheep, which he will raise and then resell in the weekly markets and on religious holidays.

In the future, Balle wishes to increase his earnings in order to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sheep to raise and then resell

loans.name: Kéba

texts.fr:
Monsieur Kéba, 53 ans est photographe de profession, marié et père de 3 enfants dont les deux sont scolarisés. Parallèlement, il fait de l’agriculture, et vient demander un crédit afin de pouvoir acheter des semences et de l’engrais pour préparer la campagne agricole. 
Kéba a des charges familiales et le payement de la location de son studio et c’est avec les bénéfices de l’activité, qu’il arrive à gérer toutes ces charges.
Kéba désire agrandir aussi bien son espace cultural et faire du maraichage, que réfectionner son studio pour qu’il soit plus moderne adapté à la clientèle actuelle.
texts.en:
Monsieur Kéba, 53 years old, is a professional photographer, married and the father of three children, of whom two are enrolled in school. At the same time, he is a farmer and is asking for a loan so that he can buy seeds and fertilizer for the crop year. 

Kéba has family obligations and also has to pay the rent on his studio, and it is thanks to the profit from this activity that he manages to cover all his financial responsibilities. 

Kéba wants to extend the land he is cultivating and have a market garden but he also wants to remodel his studio so that it is more modern and better adapted to his present clientele.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to prepare for the crop year

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr:
Babacar est un jeune célibataire de 27 ans qui évolue dans l’ambulant de divers produits comme l’habillement, la vente de chaussures et  autres produits variés. Il fréquente le guichet depuis plus de trois ans et a toujours reçu et donné satisfaction. 
Les 300000 F CFA qu’il sollicite vont lui permettre de passer la commande chez un cordonnier, d’aller au marché de la capitale pour se ravitailler en ensembles pour enfants, pantalons jeans et autres. Il n’est pas marié, mais cela n’empêche qu’il donne sa participation pour la gestion de la grande famille. Il désire agrandir son commerce voire ouvrir une cantine dans l’avenir.
texts.en:
Babacar is a young bachelor aged 27 who is selling various products door-to-door: clothing, shoes and  various other products. He has been coming to this microfinance office for more than three years and has always given and received satisfaction. 

The 300,000 F CFA that he is requesting will allow him to put in an order with a shoemaker and go to the marketplace in the capital to stock up on children's outfits, jeans and other items. The fact that he is not married does not keep him from paying his share of the expenses for the extended family. He wishes to expand his business and even open a little shop in future.

loans.use: to buy various items: clothing, shoes, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr: Monsieur Moussa est un homme marié qui habite dans les environs du Guichet. Il est maitre tailleur; et a ouvert son atelier de confection depuis plus de 15ans. Il emploie plus de 5 apprentis dans son atelier. Moussa ouvre son atelier à 8h pour le refermer à 20h. Il gère ses dépenses quotidiennes de la famille et paye les scolarités de ses enfants. Monsieiur Moussa demande ce prêt d'un montant de 350.000F pour acheter des tissus, les confectionner en chemises, patalon, et des robes pour les revendre à ses clients. A l'avenir il souhaite augmenter ses revenus d'abord ensuite améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille. Il veut aussi ouvrir un grand magasin pour exposer ses habits.
texts.en:
Mr. Moussa is a married man who lives near the branch office. He is a master tailor, and he opened his workshop over fifteen years ago. He employs over five apprentices in his shop. Moussa opens his shop at 8 AM and closes at 8 PM. He manages his family's day-to-day expenses and pays his children's schooling costs. 

Mr. Moussa is asking for this loan in the amount of 350,000 francs to purchase some cloth to make into shirts, pants, and dresses to sell to his customers. For the future, he would like to increase his income first and then improve his family's living conditions. He also wants to open a big store to display his clothing.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to make ready-to-wear clothing to sell

loans.name: Mamadou Khaly

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou est un chauffeur de taxi urbain. Il est marié et père de famille, il a une expérience de plus de 10ans dans ce secteur. Mamadou s'occupe des dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille avec les revenus qu'il gagne dans le transport. C'est un client fidèle et est à sont 4ème pret. Il sollicite ce montant de 300.000F pour acheter un moteur et le remplacer avec celui en panne qui est dans la voiture. A l'avenir Monsieur Mamadou souhaite acheter d'autres taxi et devenir un grand transporteur.
texts.en: Mr. Mamadou is a city taxi driver. He is a married father and has over ten years of experience in this sector. Mamadou takes care of his family's day-to-day expenses with the income he earns in transportation. He is a loyal client and is on his fourth loan. He is requesting the amount of 300,000 francs to purchase a motor to replace the one broken down in his vehicle. For the future, Mr. Mamadou would like to purchase other taxis to become a major transporter.

loans.use: to purchase a motor for his taxi

loans.name: Ndeye Marie

texts.fr: Mademoiselle Marie est une fille très courageuse, après ses études elle préfère aider sa mère et l'appuyer sur les dépenses quotidiennes de la maison. Elle évolue dans le commerce de divers marchandises comme la vente de tissus, de bazins et des prets à porter. Elle a une expérience de 10ans dans cet activité. Marie commence sa journée à 8h et la termine à 21h. Elle sollicite ce pret d'un montant de 400 000F acheter des tissus pour renforcer son commerce. A l'avenir elle voudrait ouvrir une grande boutique de pret à porter et de cosmétique pour augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
Marie is a very courageous young woman who, after her studies, prefers to help her mother and assist her with the household's expenses.  She sells various goods such as fabrics, bazin cloth, and ready-to-wear clothing.  She has a ten-year experience in this field.

Marie works from 8AM until 9PM.  She is requesting this loan of 400,000 francs to buy fabrics in order to boost her business.  In the future, she would like to open a large store to sell ready-to-wear clothing and cosmetics, which would allow her to increase her revenues and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, damask cloth, and ready-to-wear  clothing for resale to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils and stoves for resale.

loans.name: Aita

texts.fr: Madame Aita est une femme mariée. Elle vit au Sénégal avec sa famille. Elle s’active dans le commerce et pratique la vente de  poisson qu’elle a démarré depuis 2004. Cette activité lui permet de supporter une partie de ses charges familiales.  Membre de  l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC, elle sollicite un prêt de 100.000 francs CFA prévu  pour renforcer son fonds de roulement afin  de  acheter davantage de produits et   satisfaire la demande sa clientèle en poissons. Par conséquent l’augmentation de ses bénéfices a travers ce financement pourrait l’aider a améliorer sa situation financière et subvenir davantage aux besoins de sa famille. Elle souhaite postérieurement bâtir une maison et la mettre en location pour avoir des revenus supplémentaires.
texts.en:
Madame Aita is a married woman. She lives in Senegal with her family. She is a businesswoman who sells fish, a business she began in 2004. This activity allows her to cover part of her family expenses. 

As a member of one of U-IMCEC's branches, she is asking for a loan of 100,000 francs CFA to provide her with more working capital so that she can buy more fish and satisfy the demand of her customers. As a result of this loan, her additional profit should help her to improve her financial situation so that she can do more to support her family's needs. She would later like to build a house and rent it out for additional income.

loans.use: to buy fish to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new engine for his taxi.

loans.name: Binetou Wahab

texts.fr: Madame Bintou wahab est une femme commerçante qui réside dans l’une des communautés villageoises du  Sénégal. Elle pratique  la vente de prêt à porter et elle fait cela depuis quasiment 03 ans. C’est  grâce à son  activité de commerce  qu’elle supporte une partie des   charges  de sa famille.  (Nourriture, loyer, factures). Elle est  adhérente a l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC et elle a honoré son engagement par rapport à son a son premier crédit. Elle sollicite un nouveau prêt  d’un montant de 400.000 Francs CFA pour acheter des articles de prêt-à-porter à revendre. Avec ce financement, elle va renforcer son fonds de roulement afin qu’elle puisse satisfaire les exigences de ses clients. La rentabilité du projet en question participera à l’amélioration des conditions alimentaires de sa famille, à hausser son niveau d’épargne et à renforcer son fonds de roulement pour booster  son activité. Elle voudrait être  une grande commerçante   import-export  et gérer des  conteneurs de marchandises diverses.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bintou Wahab is a merchant who lives in a village of Senegal. She has been selling ready-to-wear apparel for nearly three years. This activity allows her to cover some of the household expenses (food, rent, various bills). 

She is a member of a U-IMCEC branch where she has correctly repaid a prior loan. She is seeking a new loan in the amount of 400,000 Francs CFA to buy ready-to-wear merchandise for resale. This credit will allow her to strengthen her working capital and better meet customer demand. The success of this endeavor will help to improve her family’s living conditions, to increase her savings and to bolster her activity. 

She wants to become an important businesswoman in import-export, and to manage containers of miscellaneous merchandise.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Anta

texts.fr:
Madame Anta est  âgée de 58 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants. Elle fait du commerce depuis plus de 20 ans déjà, elle a débuté dès le jeune âge en accompagnant  sa mère dans les marchés. Son commerce consiste à vendre de la friperie. Elle démarre sa journée à 9h jusqu’à 17h. Elle vient solliciter pour la seconde fois un crédit pour pouvoir s’approvisionner en habillements légers compte tenu de la période de chaleur.
C’est en grande partie grâce aux revenus de cette activité, qu’elle réussi à donner un coup de main à la gestion de la dépense quotidienne du foyer.
Elle a comme ambition d’aider tout ces enfants à se gérer eux même dans la vie.
texts.en:
Ms. Anta is 58 years old, married and mother of six children. She has been a retail merchant for over 20 years.

She began at an early age, accompanying her mother in the markets. Her business is to sell used clothing, and her day lasts from 9 am until 5 pm.

She is requesting a credit loan for the second time, so she can replenish her supplies of light clothing, given the current period of hot weather.

It was largely due to the income from this activity that she was able to give a helping hand in managing daily household expenditures. Her ambition is to help all her children to manage their own lives.

loans.use: buy used clothing to resell

loans.name: Maty

texts.fr: Âgée de 29 ans, la dame Maty fait de la vente de poisson frais et cela depuis maintenant plus de cinq ans. Elle a débuté son activité avec un capital de cinquante mille francs, tiré d’une tontine. Maty  est novice dans le crédit car c’est sa première expérience. Elle n’a besoin que de 150000F CFA pour pouvoir acheter au moins 3 caisses de poissons et revendre dans le marché local et dans les domiciles car il a aussi une clientèle parmi les particuliers. Elle est mariée et appuie son mari dans les charges de la maison. Elle désire voir son commerce améliorer afin d’acheter beaucoup plus de caisses de poissons et de maximiser  son profit.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maty, age 29, sells fresh fish and has been doing so for more than five years. She began her business with working capital amounting to 50,000 francs which she got from a revolving savings group. 

Maty is a first-time borrower. She only needs 150,000 F CFA to be able to buy three cases of fish to resell in the local marketplace and at people's homes, since she also has individual clients. She is married and helps her husband cover the family expenses. She would like to see her business improve so that she can buy more cases of fish and maximize her profit.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish to sell.

loans.name: Mor

texts.fr:
Mor est un jeune qui a investi dans le transport et particulièrement dans celui des motos-taxi. Il est âgé de 32, marié et père de 3 enfants. Il vient renouveler pour l’acquisition d’une moto. Comme il apparait sur la photo, il va acheter ce modèle qui est plus adéquat pour faire du transport. Il le conduit lui-même et travaille de 8h du matin jusqu’à minuit.
Mor s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et de la scolarité de ses enfants.
  S’il avait les moyens, Mor investirait dans le transport de taxi-clando, il pense pouvoir réaliser ce rêve sous peu avec l’appui de l’IMCEC puisse qu’il a déjà commencé à collaborer avec elle.
texts.en:
Mor is a young man who has invested in transportation, particularly in motorcycle taxi transportation.  He is 32 years old, married, and the father of three children.  He is taking a new loan to purchase a motorcycle.  He is going to buy the type of motorcycle shown in the photo, which is more suitable for transportation.  Mor rides himself and works from 8 AM until midnight.

Mor takes care of his family's daily expenses and covers his children's school fees.  If he had the means to do it, he would invest in informal motorcycle transportation.  He thinks that he will soon be able to achieve his dream, with the support of the UIMCEC, since he is already a client of the organization.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for transportation.

loans.name: Bassirou

texts.fr:
Agé de 58 ans, marié et père de cinq enfants, monsieur Bassirou s’active dans le commerce depuis plus de 15 ans. Il vend des tissus et possède une cantine dans le marché.
Monsieur Bassirou, habite au centre-ouest du Sénégal, et travaille avec l’IMCEC depuis seulement deux ans. Il a déjà bénéficié d’un crédit qu’il a payé sans problème. Ce renouvellement de prêt lui permettra d’acheter des tissus à la mode pour maintenir sa clientèle.
Monsieur Bassirou gère la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et s’occupe de l’éducation de ses enfants. Il travaille pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille et veux agrandir l’activité pour la rendre plus rentable.
texts.en:
Bassirou is 58 years old, married, and the father of five children.  He has been actively involved in commerce for more than 15 years.  He sells fabrics and owns a booth at the market.

Bassirou lives in the central-western part of Senegal and became a client of the UIMCEC only two years ago.  He has already received a loan which he has repaid without any difficulty.  This new loan will allow him to buy fashionable fabrics in order to maintain his customer base.

Bassirou manages the day-to-day expenses of his family and takes care of his children's education.  He works to improve his family's living conditions and wants to expand his activity in order to make it more profitable.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds and manure

loans.name: Yatma

texts.fr: Monsieur Yatma est un homme agé de 33 ans qui habite aux environs du Guichet ; c’est un commerçant qui évolue dans la vente des produits cosmétiques. Il détient une cantine au niveau du marchand et à plus de 15ans d’expérience. Monsieur Yatma est marié et père de famille,  il commence sa journée à 8h et la termine à 18h. Il sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 250.000F pour acheter et vendre des produits cosmétiques comme le lait, les parfums, etc. Monsieur Yatma gere les charges quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais d’scolarité de ses enfant. A l’avenir, il souhait avoir une autre cantine pour augmenter ses revenus
texts.en: Mr. Yatma is a 33-year-old man who lives near the branch office. He is a merchant trading in cosmetic products. He has a vendor's stall and has over fifteen years of experience. Mr. Yatma is a married father. His days starts at 8 AM and ends at 6 PM. He is requesting this loan in the amount of 250,000 francs to purchase cosmetics, such as body lotions, perfumes, etc. to sell. Mr. Yatma manages his family's day-to-day expenses and the cost of his children's schooling. For the future, he would like to have another stall to increase his revenues.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products, such as body lotions and perfumes, to sell

loans.name: Coumba Diodio

texts.fr: Madame coumba est une femme âgée de 36 ans qui évolue dans le commerce de légumes depuis plus de 15 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Madame Coumba sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 100.000 pour acheter des produits alimentaires comme le riz, l’huile, le lait et du savon pour les revendre et diversifier son commerce. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes de la maison. Et souhaite à l’avenir augmenter ses revenus pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en: Ms. Coumba is a 36-year-old woman who has been selling vegetables for over fifteen years. She is a married mother. Ms. Coumba is requesting this loan in the amount of 100,000 francs to purchase grocery items, such as rice, oil, soap, and milk to resell and to diversify her business. Her day starts at 8 AM and ends at 7 PM. She helps out her husband in managing day-to-day household expenses. For the future, she would like to increase her income to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items, such as rice, oil, and sugar to sell to her customers

loans.name: Aladji

texts.fr: Monsieur Aladji est un homme agé de 41 qui habite dans la commune. Il est marié et père de famille. Il est bijoutier depuis plus de 10ans et gère les charges de toutes les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille. Monsieur Aladji commence sa journée à 9h pour descendre à 19h. Il demande ce crédit d’un montant de 200.000F pour acheter de la matière 1ère telle que l’or pour les confectionner en bijoux et les vendre à ses clients.  A l’avenir il souhaite développer son activité à telle mesure de ne plus avoir besoin de crédit des mutuelles
texts.en: Mr. Aladji is a 41-year-old man who  lives in the Commune. He is a married father and has been a jeweler for over ten years. He manages all of his family's day-to-day expenses. Mr. Aladji's day starts at 9 AM and finishes at 7 PM. He is asking for this loan in the amount of 200,000 francs to purchase some raw materials, such as gold, to make into jewelry to sell to his customers. For the future, he would like to develop his business, such that he no longer needs loans from rotating credit associations.

loans.use: to purchase gold for making jewelry to sell

loans.name: Mbaye Boye

texts.fr: Mbaye boye est un homme marié et père de famille qui est agé de 47 ans. Il est tapissier de profession et a une expérience de plus de 25 ans dans cette activité. Il commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 18h. Mbaye gère les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et la scolarité de ses enfants. Il sollicite ce crédit d’un montant de 300.000F pour acheter des tissus et du bois enfin de pouvoir confectionner des fauteuils et des chaises qu’il vend à ses clients. Monsieur Mbaye souhaite acheter les élements nécessaires pour faire des meubles de qualité et augmenter ses revenus
texts.en: Mbaye Boye is a married father who is 47 years old. He is an upholsterer by trade and has over 25 years of experience in this business. His days starts at 8 AM and ends at 6 PM. Mbaye manages his family's day-to-day expenses and his children's schooling costs. He is requesting this loan in the amount of 300,000 francs to purchase some cloth and lumber to be able to make chairs and armchairs, which he sells to his customers. Mr. Mbaye would like to purchase the necessary elements to make quality furniture and to increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase mattresses, wood, and cloth to make furniture to sell

loans.name: Saliou

texts.fr: Monsieur Saliou est un jeune boutiquier de 33 ans qui évolue dans le commerce depuis 5 ans. Il a démarré son activité grâce à l’amour qu’il vouait au commerce avec de maigres revenus, argent qu’il avait économisé petit à petit. Il possède une boutique dans lequel il vend des denrées alimentaires comme du lait, des bouillons, du savon, de la tomate, de la boisson et d’autres produits divers. Il commence sa journée à 7h et ferme à 19h du soir.
texts.en: Mr. Saliou is a young shopkeeper, 33 years old, who has been working in commerce for five years. He started this business out of a devoted love for it.  Although the revenues were meager, he had saved money little by little. He owns a store where he sells grocery items, such as lotions, bouillon cubes, soap, tomatoes, beverages, and a variety of other goods. His day starts at 7 AM and ends at 7 PM.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items, such as rice, oil, sugar to sell

loans.name: Sope Serigne Babacar Sy Group

texts.fr: Le groupement Sope Serigne Babacar Sy est un groupe mixte composé de 4 femmes et d’un homme habitant le meme quartier. Ils ont nommé comme président Monsieur Déthié qui a levé la main dans la photo. C’est un homme marié et père de famille. Il évolue dans la location de sonorisation pour les journées culturelles et les cérémonies religieuses, il a une expérience de 11ans dans cet activité. Monsieur Déthié sollicite ce montant de 200.000F pour acheter des radios et les louer après. C’est lui qui gère les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille. Déthié commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer  à 15h. Il voudrait bénéficier de plus de crédits en vue de diversifier son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
The group Sope Serigne Babacar Sy is a mixed group made up of four women and a man living in the same area. They appointed Mr. Déthié as their president, his hand is raised on the photo.

He is a married man and a father. His business is the rental of sound systems for cultural days and religious ceremonies. He has 11 years of experience in this activity. Mr. Diéthié is requesting this amount of 200, 000 Francs to buy radios and to rent them out.

He manages the daily expenses of the family. He starts his day at 9 am and finishes at 3pm. He would like to receive more loans in order to diversify his activity and improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to rent out radios for cultural days.

loans.name: Jappale Sor Daga 1 Group

texts.fr:
Habitant le même quartier, 03 femmes et 2 hommes se sont regroupées en groupe de crédit pour venir solliciter un appui au niveau de l’IMCEC et pouvoir augmenter leur fond de roulement : c’est le groupe de crédit JAPPALE SOR DAGA 1.
Leur présidente, la dame Astou, elle, achète du mil et du sucre pour préparer des bouillies comme le  Thiakry et des jus de fruits qu’elle revende à ses clients. Elle fait de l’ambulant et compte sa clientèle parmi les habitants du quartier et son voisinage. Elle est mariée et participe aux charges familiales. Elle est âgée de 53ans et a 5 enfants dont l’ainé a 16 ans et le cadet 5ans. Astou adore son métier et a une expérience de 30ans dans ce domaine. Elle a toujours rêvée de devenir une grande commerçante qui voyagerait à travers le monde entier. En attendant cela, elle aimerait beaucoup ouvrir une cantine ou elle ira exposer ses produits alimentaires et rester sur place vue son age.
texts.en:
Living in the same district, 3 women and 2 men have formed a loan group to request support from the microfinance institution U-IMCEC for increasing their working capital. This loan group is: JAPPALE SOR DAGA 1. 

Their president, Ms. Astou, purchases millet and sugar to make porridges, such as 'thiakry', and juice drinks that she sells to her customers. She goes door to door and counts as her customers the inhabitants of her district and neighborhood. She is married and helps cover family expenses. She is 53 years old and has five children, of whom the oldest is 16 years old, and the youngest is 5. 

Astou loves her work and has thirty years of experience in this domain. She has always dreamed of becoming a major merchant who would travel the world over. In the meanwhile, she would like very much to open a stall, where she will display her food products and stay in one place, given her age.

loans.use: to purchase millet and sugar to make porridges, such as 'thiakry', and juice drinks to sell to her customers

loans.name: Magatte

texts.fr: Madame Magatte est une femme agée de 34 ans qui évolue dans le commerce de vente de petit déjeuner. Elle a une expérience de 6ans dans cette activité et commence sa journée à 7h 30mn pour la terminer à 11h. Elle prie en charges les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille. Madame Magatte sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 100 000 F pour renforcer les produits alimentaires nécessaires pour la vente du petit déjeuner. Elle souhaite développer son activité et augmenter les revenus afin d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en: Ms. Magatte is a 34-year-old woman who has a business selling breakfasts. She has six years of experience in this work. Her day starts at 7:30 AM and finishes at 11 AM. She is responsible for her family's day-to-day expenses. Ms. Magatte is requesting this loan in the amount of 100,000 francs to bolster her supplies which are necessary for selling breakfasts. She would like to develop her business and increase her income in order to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, such as milk, sugar, and coffee to sell breakfasts

loans.name: Talla

texts.fr: Talla âgé de 29 ans célibataire sans enfant , il ne supporte aucune charge sauf son commerce , depuis 3 ans il pratique le commerce ambulant pour épargner de l'argent et préparer son avenir . Il avait bénéficié d'un 1er crédit 200 000f qu'il a remboursé sans difficulté , jusqu’à construire un local dans la maison comme sa boutique . Il sollicite un crédit 400 000f pour augmenter le stock des marchandises pour satisfaire sa cliente . Il souhaite devenir un grand commerçant et même faire de l'import export .
texts.en: Talla, aged 29, is unmarried and without children. He has no expenses, except for his business. For three years, he has sold goods door to door to save money and prepare for his future. He had benefited from an initial loan of 200,000 francs, which he repaid without a problem, in order to build a spot in his house as his store. He is requesting a loan of 400,000 francs to increase his inventory of merchandise [clothing] to satisfy his customers. He would like to become a major merchant and even work in import-export.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of clothing

loans.name: Deggo Joubale Group

texts.fr: Le groupement s’appelle DEGGO JOUBALE qui regroupe des femmes du même quartier. Leur présidente Madame Sophie est celle qui a levé la main dans la photo. Elle est marié et mère de famille. Elle évolue dans le commerce des bouillies comme le Ngalakh et le Thiakry préparées à base de pate d’arachide, du mil, du lait et du sucre. Sophie a une expérience de 5ans dans cette activité. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter ces produits alimentaires qui entrent dans la préparation succulente des bouillies. A l’avenir elle souhaite ouvrir une boutique pour pouvoir écouler rapidement ses produits alimentaires.
texts.en: The group called "DEGGO JOUBALE" is composed of women from the same district. Their president, Ms. Sophie, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is a married mother. She works in commerce selling porridges, such as Ngalakh and Thiakry, which are made with peanut butter, millet, milk, and sugar. Sophie has five years of experience in this business. She is requesting this loan to purchase these supplies which go into making delicious porridges. For the future, she would like to open a store to sell her products quickly.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, such as sugar, millet, and peanut butter for making and selling porridges

loans.name: Ikhsane Group

texts.fr:
IKHSANE est le nom d’un groupe de crédit qui rassemble quatre femmes et un homme habitant dans un petit village situé à environ 17 km de la ville principale. Ces femmes ont pour activité la vente de fruits et légumes .Elles s’approvisionnent  dans le village même et écoule sa marchandise vers la capitale.
Leur présidente, la dame Ndèye Déguène  est mariée et responsable puisse qu’elle participe à  la dépense quotidienne de son foyer. Elle achète et revend des fruits et légumes. Elle a une expérience de 6mois sans son activité Dans l’avenir elle aimerait avoir une cantine au marché et sa propre autonomie financière pour mieux gérer son commerce.
texts.en:
IKHSANE is the name of the loan group composed of four women and a man living in a small village located about 17 km from the main town. These women sell fruit & vegetables. They get their supplies from the same village and sell their goods around the capital. 

Their president, Ms. Ndèye Déguène, is married and the group's official, since she helps to cover her home's day-to-day expenses. She purchases and resells fruit & vegetables. She has six months of experience in this business. For the future, she would like to have a stall at the market and to be financially autonomous to manage her business better.

loans.use: to purchase fruit & vegetables to sell

loans.name: Japalante Ndiolofene Group

texts.fr:
L e GPF  JAPALANTE NDIOLOFENE  dont le nom qu’elle ont donné au groupement signifie » la Solidarité » regroupe 6  braves femmes qui font du commerce de divers produits. Elles sont venu solliciter leur 1er crédit à l’IMCEC afin d’améliorer leur activité de petit commerce.
La présidente, PENDA  est une dame de 57 ans qui fait de la teinture et la vente de produits de teinture. Elle a une expérience de 10 ans dans ce domaine. Elle est mariée et a 5 enfants qui ont entre 25 et 15 ans. Elle n’a pas de charges sinon  personnelles, mais travaille quand même pour améliorer les conditions alimentaires  sa famille.PENDA commence sa journée à 8h pour descendre à 18h. Elle sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 350 000F pour renforcer son fond de commerce.
Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle aimerait équiper sa chambre à coucher
texts.en:
The loan group "JAPALANTE NDIOLOFENE" whose name means "solidarity" is composed of six good and honest women who do commerce in a variety of goods. The women are here to request their first loan at the microfinance institution U-IMCEC in order to improve their small-scale commerce. 

The president, Penda, is a 57-year-old woman who dyes cloth and sells the goods produced. She has ten years of experience in this domain. She is married and has five children, from 15 to 25 years old. She has no expenses, except for personal expenses. But even so, she works to improve her family's food situation. Penda's day starts at 8 AM and ends at 6 PM. She is requesting this loan in the amount of 350,000 francs to bolster her working capital. With the profits from her business, she would like to furnish her bedroom.

loans.use: to purchase damask fabrics and products for making and selling dyed cloth

loans.name: Seydou

texts.fr:
Monsieur Seydou, âgé de 25 ans, est célibataire sans enfant. Il s’active dans le transport depuis 2 ans. Il s’est spécialisé dans le transport de mototaxi. Il vient pour la 3ème fois solliciter un crédit  de 300000F CFA pour l’acquisition d’une moto djakarta dans le but d’en faire un moyen de transport. Il travaille lui-même et reste actif du matin au soir.
Il n’a pas de charges qui incombent sinon qu’il participe à la dépense quotidienne.
Il désire avoir d’autres motos pour développer son transport et veut même acheter un véhicule pour en faire un taxi-clando.
texts.en: Mr. Seydou, aged 25, is unmarried and without children. He has been active in the transport sector for two years. He is specialized in mototaxi transport. He is here for the third time to request a loan of 300,000 francs CFA to acquire a 'djakarta' motorbike for transportation. He works for himself and is busy from morning till night. He has no expenses that impede him, except for the day-to-day expenses he covers. He would like to have more motorbikes to develop his transport business, and he even wants to purchase a vehicle to use for informal taxi services.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to offer transportation services

loans.name: Ndèye Lobé

texts.fr:
Madame Ndèye Lobé, une dame de 44 ans, marié et mère de 2 enfants s’activent dans le commerce depuis cinq ans déjà. Elle habite au centre ouest du Sénégal. Elle vient pour la première fois solliciter un crédit de 500000F CFA pour améliorer son commerce qui consiste à vendre des tissus. Elle possède une cantine dans le marché.
Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle appuie son mari dans les charges familiales. Elle désire agrandir son commerce en diversifiant  ses produits et services avec l’appui de financement venant de l’IMCEC.
texts.en: Ms. Ndèye Lobé, a 44-year-old woman, is a married mother of two. She has been active in commerce for five years already. She lives in west-central Senegal. She is here for the first time to request a loan of 500,000 francs CFA to improve her business, which involves selling fabrics. She owns a stall at the market. With the profits from her business, she supports her husband in covering family expenses. She would like to expand her business by diversifying her products and services with financial support from the microfinance institution IMCEC.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to resell

loans.name: Astou

texts.fr:
Madame Astou, une dame de 55ans, mariée  mais n’a pas d’enfant, s’active dans le commerce d’habillements et de savons depuis 5 ans maintenant. Elle a démarré avec un capital de 25000F CFA avec ses propres moyens tiré d’une épargne.
 Madame Astou, vient solliciter un crédit de 150000F CFA pour acheter du savon venant de la Cote d’Ivoire et des tissus, on la voit sur la photo avec un échantillon de tissus à la main et une variété de savon. Elle n’a pas d’enfants mais cela ne l’empêche pas de participer à la dépense quotidienne en appuyant son mari.
Comme projet futur, elle désire ouvrir un grand magasin et devenir une grande commerçante.
texts.en: Ms. Astou, a 55-year-old woman, is married but has no children. She has been active in selling clothing and soaps for five years now. She started off with 25,000 francs CFA in capital of her own that she had saved. Ms. Astou is here to request a loan of 150,000 francs to purchase soaps from Cote d'Ivoire and some cloth. In the photo, you can see her with a sample of cloth in hand and a variety of soaps. She has no children, but this does not prevent her from helping to cover day-to-day expenses by supporting her husband. For the future, she would like to  open a big store and become a major merchant.

loans.use: to purchase cloth and soap to sell

loans.name: Doña Lidia Group

texts.es:
Este grupo está formado por cuatros socias una de ellas es Lidia mujer de 48 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 16 y 05 años respectivamente. Desde hace 6 años su negocio es la venta de leche agria, frijoles cocidos y refrescos naturales. De ser cliente de la institución tiene 4 años de los cuales todos los prestamos los paga en tiempo y fecha, su hijo mayor le ayuda atender el negocio.
Este crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de frijoles crudos por quintal, leche de vaca para hacer leche agria, vasos descartables, cucharas descartables, cucharas, sal etc. María de los Angeles  tiene 38 años de edad y su negocio es de una pulpería, Sandra tiene 36 años y su negocio es la venta de prensa pelo, ropa usada chapas y María Elene su negocio es una pulpería y tiene 27 años de edad.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four members. One of them is Lidia, a 48 year old woman. She is single and has two children, aged 16 and 05, respectively. Six years ago, she began her business selling buttermilk, cooked beans and natural juices. She has been a client of the institution for 4 years and she has paid off all her loans on time. Her oldest son helps her run the business.  

She will invest this loan in buying raw beans by the quintal, cow's milk to make buttermilk, disposable cups, disposable spoons, salt, etc. María de los Angeles is 38 and her business is a convenience store, Sandra is 36 and her business is selling hair clips, and María Elene is 27 and her business is also a convenience store.

loans.use: to invest in buying raw beans by the quintal, cow's milk to make butter milk, disposable cups and spoons, salt, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Virginia

texts.es: Rosa es una microempresaria de éxito su negocio es la fabricación de agua purificada, heladitos y jugos en bolsa actividad que viene realizando desde hace 30 años, es soltera y cuenta con tres trabajadores asalariados. El crédito lo quiere invertir en la compra de materia prima como plásticos, azúcar, esencias, sacarina, cítricos, maicenas, leche etc. con el préstamo anterior logro comprar una refrigeradora y más materia prima.
texts.en: Rosa is a successful micro-business woman. Her business is producing purified water, ice cream and juice in bags. She has been doing this activity for 30 years. She is single and has three salaried employees. She wants to invest the loan in raw materials such as plastic items, sugar, saccharin, citrus, milk, etc. With the previous loan she was able to buy a refrigerator and more raw materials.

loans.use: to invest in buying raw materials such as plastic items, sugar, seasonings, saccharin, citrus, starch, milk, etc.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen is a very happy and lucky man, since he has a big and nice family, always filled with cheerful voices and games of his grandchildren. Armen lives in the village of Sevqar which is in Tavush region. He has two sons and two daughters and all of them are married and live separately. Only their youngest son lives with his parents. 

Armen has no higher education, but he has always worked. For some time he used to work as a loader at the state farm, then he has worked as a storekeeper, but it is already nineteen years that he has been engaged in farming (cattle breeding, bee keeping) and agriculture. The income from it has helped Armen to cover the expenses of his children's education and their wedding parties. 

Armen mentions that he loves his farm animals and takes care of them very carefully and with responsibility. He has seven cows, two bull, three calves, a horse, five piglets, twenty chickens and ten beehives. Armen’s son twice has taken loans from Nor Horizon and successfully repaid them, and now it is on his advice that Armen wants to ask for  a loan from Kiva lenders.

 He is asking for a loan in order to buy a lot of animal fodder, since his farm is rich with animals and he must be sure that he can provide them with a warm and well-fed winter.

loans.use: To buy a lot of animal fodder for winter

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy second hand clothes to sell

loans.name: Madres Solidarias Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Deyanira es una mujer joven de 39 años, casada, con dos hijos de 19 y 10 años, su negocio es la venta de fritanga, y refrescos naturales los fines de semanas, esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace 10 años consecutivos. En la institución tiene un año de los cuales a pagado satisfactoriamente. Este crédito lo quiere invertir en la compra de materia prima como arroz, aceite, azúcar, carne de res, carne de pollo, sal, plátano verde, plátano maduro, queso, carne de cerdo, frutas como melón, granadilla, zanahoria, remolacha, banano, leche en bolsa etc. con el crédito anterior logro comprar un freezer de 25 lbs para guardar productos, Rosa María tiene 56 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de fritanga, frijoles cocidos y una mini pulpería y Eimee tiene 30 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de bisutería y cosméticos de la Avon.
texts.en:
A group formed by three entrepreneurial partners, one of which is Deyanira.  She is a young, 39 year old woman who is married with two children aged 19 and 10.  Her business sells fried foods and natural drink on the weekends.  She has been working in this business for the past 10 years. She has been with the institution for one year, which has been very beneficial.  

She wants to use this loan to invest in the purchase of raw materials such as rice, oil, sugar, beef, chicken, salt, green plantains, ripe plantains, cheese, pork, fruits such as: melon, passionfruit, carrots, beets and bananas, bagged milk, etc... With the previous loan, she was able to purchase a 25 lb freezer to store her products.

Rosa Maria is 56 years old, and has a business selling fried foods, cooked beans, and a small convenience store.  Eimee is 30 years old and sells jewelry and Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: to purchase raw material such as rice, oil, sugar, beef, chicken, salt, green plantains, ripe plantains, cheese, pork, fruits such as: melon, passionfruit, carrots, beets and bananas, bagged milk, etc...

loans.name: Ligia

texts.es: Ligia, tiene la edad de 29 años, es casada y  tiene 2 hijos que son mu mayor prioridad y vive con su esposo e hijos. Ligia es ama de casa. Ella quiere comprar una moto para que su esposo se traslade más rápido y cómodo al trabajo   como peón agrícola.   Tiene varios años que se dedica a éste trabajo y quiere crecer y también desea que su familia sea muy productiva. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. No  ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja.También tiene el deseo de que sus hijos tengan mejora calidad de vida y poderles ayudar a estudiar y que tengan un mejor nivel de vida, aumentando los ingresos.
texts.en: Ligia is 29 years old. She is married and has 2 children who are his main priority. She lives with her husband and children. Ligia is a housewife. She wants to buy a motorcycle so that her husband can get to his job as an agricultural worker more quickly and comfortably. She has been doing this work for several years and she wants to grow and she also wants for her family to be more productive. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hasn't taken out other loans from state banks or cooperatives, but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with more ease of payment and a much lower rate of interest. She also wants for her children to have a better quality of life and be able to help them go to school and have a better quality of life, by increasing income.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for work.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio, está casado, tiene la edad de 29  y vive con su esposa e hija que son  su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, el comprara abonos, plaguicidas y herbicidas necesarias para mantener su cultivo en buenas condiciones. El cuenta con un terreno apto para esta explotación de proyecto y su plantación esta en etapas regulares por lo cual es que piensa asistirlo para aumentar su producción para este año. El tiene como meta llegar a generar más ganancias económicas para estos tiempos tan difíciles y poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El ya había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Antonio is 29 and lives with his wife and daughter, who are his number one priority. The loan will be used to buy supplies for his coffee plantation; he will buy manure and pesticide and weed killer, which he needs to keep his crop in good condition.  The plot of land he owns is perfect for his project and his plantation is doing well and so he thinks he can tend it so as to boost his production this year.  His goal is to increase his earnings in these difficult times and to provide a better quality of life for his family.  This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He has already had other loans from state banks, but FUNDECOSUR has granted him a loan with better loan facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to tend his coffee plantation

loans.name: José Rodolfo

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 69 años de edad, casado y ha procreado tres hijos. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de sus  padres, ya que en ese tiempo era lo que los padres heredaban a sus hijos, por la difícil situación económica familiar. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para prepararse junto a su esposa e hijos e ir al terreno en donde cultivan a trabajar; luego se dirige a otros terrenos de otras personas a prestar sus servicios como jornal. Para comprar los insumos agrícolas, debe caminar a pie unos 6 kilómetros hasta llegar al lugar en donde aborda el autobús. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar tres vacas lecheras, para vender la leche y generar mejores ingreso para el sustento de su familia

 José planea en un futuro poder comprar más vacas lecheras y producir mas leche para procesarla, ya que no quiere depender solo de sus cultivos; sino de otra fuente de ingresos tambien.
texts.en:
José is a 69 year old man. He is married and has three children. He is a person who has been working in farming for several years, a trade he learned from his parents. Back then, it was what parents passed on to their children, because of the difficult family financial situation. He gets up at 5:00 a.m. to get ready with his wife and children to go to their cropland to work. Later he goes to other land belonging to other people to work as a laborer. To buy the agricultural materials, he has to walk about 6 kilometers to arrive at the place where he catches the bus.

The loan he is asking Fundación Campo for is to buy three dairy cows to sell the milk and have better income to support his family.  

 In the future, José plans on being able to buy more dairy cows and producing more milk to be processed. He doesn't want to depend just on his crops, but have another source of income as well.

loans.use: to buy three dairy cows to sell milk and generate better income to support his family.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old and lives in the West Point area that is one of the most populated markets in Montserrado County. She is married and has four children between the ages of 33 and 20. All of her children are attending university or living on their own. She is a high school graduate, and she described herself as a potential businesswoman. Her husband is working with the LEC. She manages her business well to enable her improve her living conditions. 

Over the past 12 years, she has been running a shop in the local market without facing any serious problems. This business started with a little amount she got from her husband. She sells every day, spending 10 hours with her business. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more oil, rice, soap, batteries, etc., for her business. She likes to say thanks to the supporter of BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more oil, rice, soap, batteries, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Rana Group

texts.en:
Rana is a group composed of four Lebanese friends living in a village in Mount Lebanon. They decided to join hands and acquire a loan in order to support each other financially. Nagham is the leader and featured member of the group. She is a 32-year-old married mother of two children, standing on the far right of the picture. 

Nagham is an artist who paints and sells her paintings, and she gives painting lessons for young children. Painting has always been her passion, which is why she would like to enhance her business. Her husband is a guard at the customs, and one of her children is enrolled in a private school. This means that their combined revenue is not sufficient to provide a healthy life for their household, especially since they have to cover the schooling tuition fees. 

Nagham decided to establish the group because she would like to purchase drawing materials for her students, increasing their number, and to prepare for the exhibition she is working on.

As for the other group members, Brigitte is wearing a pink t-shirt, Rana is wearing a green shirt, and Rifa is wearing a white shirt with pink pants.

loans.use: to purchase drawing materials for her students, increasing their number, and to prepare for the exhibition she is working on.

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
As Alvard has promised, she has decided to cooperate with Kiva lenders for the second time. (She has also taken loans from Nor Horizon twice.) The first deal with Kiva helped her to buy two bull calves, so she enriched her farm and she was very happy about it.

This time the loan amount is bigger, and her plans are more: She wants to buy three piglets, a calf and a lot of animal fodder in order to pass the winter months safely. 

Alvard lives in Kirants village, in the Tavush region of Armenia. She is a widow and she takes care of her farm completely alone, since her children (a son and three daughters) are married and live apart. Alvard simultaneously with farming manages to work at the Ijevan recruitment office as an inspector. Alvard is full of hope and appreciates support from Kiva lenders very much.

loans.use: To buy three piglets, a calf and a lot of animal fodder in order to pass the winter months safely.

loans.name: Dúo Solidario Esperanza Group

texts.es:
DUO SOLIDARIO ESPERANZA

ESTE DUO ESTA CONFORMADO POR DOÑA MARIA DAMIANA ORIGINARIA DE SAN  MARTIN JILOTEPEQUE, DOÑA DAMIANA ES PROPIETARIA DE UNA  TIENDA DE CONSUMO DIARIO ELLA TIENE SU NEGOCIO DESDE HACE 3 AÑOS PERO ESTA CONTENTA PORQUE SU NEGOCIO DIA CON DIA BA CRECIENDO LUCHA Y SE ESFUERZA POR SACAR ADELANTE A SU FAMILIA Y SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA SURTIR MAS SU NEGOCIO,EN LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS DE CONSUMO DIARIO COMO ARROZ FRIJOL ACEITE Y MAS, Y ASI AUMENTAR SUS VENTAS OFRECIENDO UN MEJOR SURTIDO Y ATENCION A SUS CLIENTES, ESPERA QUE LE PUEDAN AYUDAR CON EL CREDITO SOLICITADO.
texts.en:
Duo Solidario Esperanza (Hope solidarity partnership)

The partnership was set up by María Damiana who is from San Martín Jilotepeque.  Damiana has owned and been running a grocery shop for 3 years but she is happy because the business is growing by the day.  She struggles and strives to support her family and is seeking this loan to increase her shop's stock by buying everyday groceries such as rice, beans and oil, among other things.
