María,  requiere  optar por un nuevo préstamo porque necesita mejorar su vivienda donde tiene su negocio y vive junto a su familia;  esta inversión le ayudara a comprar cerámica, lámina, ladrillo y cemento para la construcción de un cuarto.
El crédito anterior fue favorable,  ya que las condiciones económicas han mejorado, esto  le ayudo a  la reparación de maquinaria de uso empresarial.
texts.en:
María needs a new loan because she needs to improve her house where she has her business and lives with her family.  This investment will help her to buy tile, metal sheets, bricks, and cement in order to build a room.

The last loan was beneficial because her financial situation has improved.  This helped her to repair the machinery used in the business.

loans.use: to buy tile, metal sheets, bricks, and cement.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гульмира, 40 лет, замужем, многодетная мать, имеет 5 детей (4 дочери и 1 сын). Образование-среднее. Бизнесом занимается с 2007 года, начав с суммы в 25000 сом (KGS). В основном торгует продуктами питания на сельском рынке. Дополнительным доходом является небольшое хозяйство: 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок. Супруг и дети активно помогают по бизнесу. Благодаря упорному труду и оптимистичному характеру Гульмиры, ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет 8000  сом (KGS). Прибыль позволила Гульмире увеличить товар в обороте и, тем самым, улучшить семейное благосостояние. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульмира обратилась в «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70 000 сом (KGS) на пополнение товаров в обороте. Доходы от кредита Гульмира  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение товаров, а также хочет улучшить благосостояние своей семьи.
texts.en: Gulmira is 40 years old, married and has five children (four daughters and a son).  She finished high school and has had her own business since 2007 when she started it with 25,000 KGS.  She mostly sells food products at a rural market.  She receives additional income from a bit of livestock, she owns one dairy cow, and one calf.  Her husband and children actively help her with the business.  Thanks to her hard work and optimism, Gulmira has a monthly income from her business of around 8,000 KGS.  Her profits have allowed her to increase her turn over and, in turn, improve her family's well-being.  With the goal of further developing her business, Gulmira has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 70,000 KGS to buy food goods to resale.  She plans to use the income from the loan to reinvest in inventory as well as to improve her family's circumstances.

loans.use: to buy food for resale

loans.name: Syinat

texts.ru: Сыйнат, 39 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей (2 дочери и 1 сын).  Образование-высшее, работает в сельской школе преподавателем начальных классов. Сыйнат в поиске дополнительных доходов для своей семьи, с 2000 года занимается животноводством, начала этот бизнес с 20000 сом. Благодаря ее неустанному труду и помощи и поддержки своего супруга она достигла хороших результатов в хозяйстве. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет 5000  сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день она имеет хорошее  хозяйство: 2 дойные коровы, 2 теленка, 1 лошадь. Прибыль позволила Сыйнат размножить скот в домашнем хозяйстве и тем самым улучшить семейное благосостояние. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Сыйнат обратилась в «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100 000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров. Доходы от кредита Сыйнат  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, а также в будущем хочеть дать достойное образование детям.
texts.en: Syinat is 39 years old, married, and has three children (two daughters and a son).  She has a degree and works in a rural school as a teacher of primary classes.  In the year 2000, she was searching for a source of additional income for her family and began working with livestock.  She started this business with 20,000 KGS.  Thanks to her tireless efforts as well as the help and support of her husband, she has seen good results from her business.  Her monthly income is around 5,000 KGS.  Today, she has in her care two dairy cows, two calves and one horse.  Her profits have allowed Syinat to breed her livestock thus improving her family's well-being.  With the goal of further increasing her herd, Syinat has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 KGS to buy cows.  She plans on reinvesting the income from the loan to procure more animals.  In the future, she also wants to give her children a worthy education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: José Epigmenio

texts.es:
José, se dedica desde hace mas de 25 años al trabajo de la agricultura. luego asistió a una capacitación sobre el manejo de ganado lechero el cual pone en practica también. pues desde pequeño trabajo fuertemente con sus padres en la agricultura y la ganadería en pequeño.

Actualmente, es padre soltero, pues esta a cargo de sus cinco hijos dos de los cuales emigraron hacia los estados unidos, el convive con tres hijos de 22,21 y 18 años de edad respectivamente; quienes ya salieron de estudiar el bachillerato y hoy en día le ayudan en los cultivos de maíz y frijoles.

En su juventud participo en la guerra civil (militar) que azoto al país en los años 80's, del cual tiene un golpe en unos de sus pies. Él cultiva 7,000 metros cuadrados  de maíz de primera y 7,000 metros cuadrados  de maíz de postrera, ademas siembra 3,500 metros cuadrados de frijoles. Hoy en día se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y a la ganadería en pequeña escala.

El señor compra insumos agrícolas y de fertilizantes (abono, herbicidas, fungicidas, foliares) en la ciudad mas cercana que esta a 45 minutos en transporte urbano, el viaje lo hace solo y a veces en compañía de uno de sus hijos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una vaca valorada en $700.00 y el resto lo invertirá en la compra de abono para la milpa y el cultivo de frijoles. Con el financiamiento , dispondrá de capital para  comprar la vaca, que servirá para el sostenimiento de la familia, a la vez obtendrá mejores cosechas con los cultivos de granos básicos, que le permitan poseer una mejor calidad de vida y con ello sacar adelante a su familia. Pues al terminar de recolectar las cosechas venderá una parte para obtener ingresos económicos.

En su futuro don José sueña comprar un terreno y ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios superiores.
texts.en:
Jose has worked in agriculture for more than 25 years. Then he attended a training about managing dairy cattle, which he now practices as well. Since he was little, he was worked hard with his parents in agriculture and small-scale ranching. Currently he is a single father, since he is responsible for his five children, two of whom went to the United States. He lives with three of his children, ages 22, 21, and 18, respectively, who are done with their high-school studies and now help him with the corn and bean crop. 

In his youth, he was involved in the civil war (soldier) that devastated the country in the 80s, from which he has an injury on one of this feet. He grows 7,000 square meters of corn in the first season and 7,000 square meters of corn in the second season, in addition to 3,500 square meters of beans. Today he works raising pigs and cattle on a small-scale. He buys farming supplies and fertilizers (manure, herbicides, fungicides, and other fertilizers) in the closest city which is 45 minutes away on city transportation. He makes the trip by himself and sometime with one of his children. 

The loan he is seeking from Fundación Campo is to buy a cow valued at $700.00 and the rest will be invested in the purchase manure for the cornfield and the bean crop. With the financing, he will have the capital to buy the cow, which will help support his family. He will also have better harvests with the basic grains crop, which will let him have a better quality of life and move his family forward. After gathering the harvest, he will sell part of it to make money. In the future, Jose dreams of buying of buying land and helping his children with their higher education.

loans.use: to buy a cow valued at $700.00 and to purchase manure for the cornfield and the bean crop.

loans.name: Eteline

texts.en: Eteline is 35 years old and married with 3 children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pork buns in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy sacks of flour, soy sauce, chicken, salt and a large pot. In the future, Eteline hopes to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, soy sauce, chicken, salt and a large pot

loans.name: Taunese

texts.en:
Taunese is 59 years old and married with nine children. She runs a small business selling fast foods in her community and has been doing this for two years now. 

Taunese has requested a loan to buy flour, dripping oil, baking powder, bags of sugar, a cooler, gas and plastic bags. 

She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Taunese will expand her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, dripping oil, baking powder, bags of sugar, a cooler, gas and plastic bags.

loans.name: Polini

texts.en:
Polini is 34 years old and single with 1 child. She runs a small business selling pork buns and cigarettes in her community and has been doing this for 2 years. 

Polini has requested a loan to buy flour, an oven, kerosene, baking powder, a box of chicken, salt, dripping oil, and 10 packets of cigarettes. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. Polini will use her earnings to improve her business.

loans.use: to cooking supplies for her pork bun business and packets of cigarettes for resale

loans.name: Lesina

texts.en:
Lesina is a 35-year-old, married woman, with five children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Lesina has requested a loan to buy chemicals, bush-knives, a file for sharpening knives, fertilizer, and to pay school fees. She has been a member of South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) since 2010. With her profits, Lesina hopes to invest in her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, bushknives, a file for sharpening knives, fertilizer, and to pay for school fees.

loans.name: Zebuniso

texts.ru: Зебунисо 40-летняя разведенная женщина. У нее двое детей. Она со своими детьми проживает в районе Дж.Руми. Зебунисо работает учительницей в средней школе и получает маленькую зарплату, что не хватает на семейные расходы. Чтобы улучшить финансовое положение семьи она собирается заняться собственным швейным делом. Зебунисо умеет шить женские национальные платья и хочет применить свои способности на профессиональном поприще. Она обратилась за кредитом для покупки компьютерной швейной машинки модели Yamata. Она будет заниматься данной деятельностью у себя дома и уже отвела отдельную комнату, где она будет принимать заказы и шить платья. Прибыль с деятельности она планирует потратить на ремонт дома и улучшить условия проживания.
texts.en: Zebuniso is 40 years old and has two children.  She lives with them in the J.Rumy region of Tajikistan.  Zebuniso works as a teacher at a high school and receives little pay which isn't enough for her family.  In order to improve her family's financial situation, she is planning on starting a sewing business.  Zebuniso is able to sew the national women's dress and wants to apply this skill to a professional endeavor.  She is asking for a loan to buy a Yamata computerized sewing machine.  She will run this business from her home where she has a room dedicated to it.  There, she'll take orders and work.  She plans to use the profits from the business to make repairs to her home and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a computerized sewing machine to start a sewing business

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a 33-year-old woman who is single with 4 children. She has a small business of running bingo in her village. She has been in this business for 2 years. 

Maria needs a loan to buy bingo paper, bingo markers, bingo cages, and money prizes. She will use her profits to improve her business. Maria joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy bingo paper, bingo markers, bingo cages, and money prizes

loans.name: Elena

texts.en: Elena is 45 years old and married with 10 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as meats, snacks, and daily products. She has been doing this for two years. Elena needs a loan to buy bags of rice, sugar, flour, boxes of herring, chicken, soy sauce, cooking oils, and snacks and to pay for school fees. She hopes to use her profits to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, sugar, flour, boxes of herring, chicken, soy sauce, cooking oils, and snacks and to pay for school fees

loans.name: James

texts.es: James tiene 46 años, está casado y vive en una casa que Aquila junto su esposa y sus 2 hijos. James se dedica al  transporte por las calles de la ciudad. Tiene un mototaxi que pudo comprar con mucho esfuerzo y que le permite realizar su trabajo con mucha eficiencia. Por otra parte, hace 2 años, alquila un espacio en la casa de su cuñado en donde tiene establecido un taller de vulcanizado, ahí trabaja de manera eventual arreglando vehículos, pero generalmente trabaja ahí solo su cuñado y comparten las ganancias del día. Le gusta mucho su trabajo porque genera sus propios ingresos y puede administrar su tiempo de la forma que el decida. Actualmente, desea que su taller de vulcanizadora se proyecte a ser una gran tienda que siga brindando el mismo servicio, de este modo espera incrementar sus ingresos y mantener su cartera de clientela. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva, agradece a las personas que le brindan su confianza y el apoyo crediticio que necesita para continuar trabajando en sus metas. Con el monto de 600 soles, comprará algunas llantas, rodajes y otros para ponerlos a la venta en su taller.
texts.en:
James is 46 years old, married, and lives with his wife and 2 children in a home that he rents. James works in transportation in the city where he lives. He has a mototaxi that, with a lot of effort, he was able to purchase. This allows him to perform his job very efficiently.

Two years ago, he rented a space in his brother-in-law's house where he established a vulcanization workshop. He works here fixing vehicles, but he generally works alone with his brother-in-law, and they share the day's profits.

He likes his job a lot because he generates his own income and he can manage his time however he wants. He hopes that his vulcanization workshop becomes a large store that continues providing the same service. In this way, he hopes to increase his earnings and maintain his customer base.

This is his second loan with Kiva. He thanks all of the people who have had confidence in him and provided the financial support that he needs to continue working towards his goals.

With this loan of 600 soles, he will buy some tires, machines to run-in cars, and other things to sell in his workshop.

loans.use: to buy some tires and other parts to sell in his workshop.

loans.name: Kory Tawaco Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KORY TAWACO”  iniciará el vigésimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Beatriz es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: librería, venta de cosméticos, venta de mercadería (ropa y frazadas), venta de chicharron, venta de papas fritas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Beatriz es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una asesora de la institución que fue a su casa a visitarla. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa; este negocio lo emprendió por iniciativa propia utilizando los ahorros que tenía su familia.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el crédito y la capacitación.
texts.en:
The 'Kory Tawaco' Communal Bank will begin its twentieth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Exaltación Community Center. It is made up of 8 members and run by a board of directors, of which Beatriz is the president. The members of this communal bank carry out a variety of different businesses, such as selling books, cosmetics, clothing, blankets, fried pork rinds and fried potatoes.

Beatriz is one of the female micro entrepreneurs who will benefit from the loan. She says that she joined Pro Mujer two years ago, invited by one of the advisers of the group that came to visit her at her house. At present she has a business selling clothing that she launched on her own using savings that her family had. 
 
The loan she will take out now is to increase capital by purchasing clothing at the fairs in the city of El Alto to sell later at her shop. This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her home as best she can since she is single.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she responds that she likes the loan and the training.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Ehson

texts.ru:
Эхсон очень энергичный и веселый парень, он не любит сидеть сложа руки, все время чем то занимается.   Он не женат, но надеется что в этом году ему повезет и он найдет себе подходящую  кандидатуру и женится.   Он работает в одной организации, но  заработной платы ему не хватает. Поэтому , он также со своим отцом арендовал землю и выращивает различную сельскохозяйственную  культуру. Эхсон очень любит и дорожит своими родителями, старается делать для них все,чтобы они не нуждались ни в чем. Мать Эхсона очень долгое время хотела сделать ремонт в доме, но никак не получалось.  
Эхсон хочет помочь родителям провести ремонт дома, так как его родители уже не молоды и сил на такие дела  уже не хватает.  Он хочет взять на себя ремонт дома, он считает что дети всегда должны помогать родителям.  У Эхсона есть накопленные деньги но не много не хватает, поэтому он решил обратится в организацию Арванд за кредитом.  Эхсон на полученный кредит купит строительные материалы.   Он  очень хочет осуществить мечту своей матери и  надеется на поддержку от Арванд.
texts.en: Ehson is a very energetic and fun guy.  He doesn't like to sit on his hands and always finds something to be doing.  He is not married but he hopes to be lucky this year and find himself a suitable candidate to wed.  He works at one organization, but his pay there isn't enough.  So he and his father rent land where they grow various crops.  Ehson loves and cherishes his parents, and tries to do for them all so they don't want for anything.  Ehson's mother has wanted to make repairs to their home for some time but she's been unable to.  Ehson wants to help his parents make the repairs on their home since they are no longer young and don't have the strength for such a task any longer.  He wants to take responsibility for the project and feels that children should always help their parents.  Ehson has some savings, but not enough.  For this reason, he has turned to Arvand for a loan.  Ehson will use the funds to buy building materials.  He very much wants to make his mother's dream come true and relies on Arvand's support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Saymuhidin

texts.ru: Саймухидину 54 года. Он образованный и умный человек. Саймухидин окончил Технологический Институт Таджикистана в 1981 году. Он начал свою карьеру с простого инженера в колхозе и постепенно перешел на руководящие позиции. Он честный и добросовестный человек и поэтому где бы, он не работал, везде его любили. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Возраст детей составляет от 13 до 26 лет. Его жена работает в фермерском хозяйстве. Саймухидин хочет, чтобы его дети были образованными и поэтому один из его сыновей учится в университете. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор его сына. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1800 долларов США для оплаты учебы сына. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Saymuhidin is 54 years old, educated and smart.  He graduated from the Technological Institute of Tajikistan in 1981.  He started his career as a simple agricultural engineer and gradually moved on to management positions.  He is an honest and conscientious person so he's well-loved where ever he is working.  He's married and has five children between the ages of 13 and 26.  His wife works on a farm.  Saymuhidin wants his children to be education so one of his sons is currently attending university.  He must pay his son's tuition and is asking for a loan of 1800 USD to do so.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his son’s university tuition

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 22-year-old single man from a small village near Deir el Balah. He is an employee in the public sector and gets a low income. Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his personal use. Ahmad would like to learn English by using some programs on the internet, read more about the international news and also talk with his family inside and outside Palestine. 
Ahmad appears in the photo with his new laptop.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his personal use

loans.name: Vaavaai

texts.en:
Vaavaai is a 30-year-old married woman with two children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Vaavaai has requested a loan to buy bush-knives, chemicals, pickaxes, barbed wire, and fertilizer.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Vaavaai hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bush-knives, chemicals, pickaxes, barbed wire, and fertilizer

loans.name: Matauaina

texts.en:
Matauaina is a 39-year-old married woman with six children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Matauaina has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, bush-knives, fertilizer, file, and chemicals for her taro root crop and to pay for school fees. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Matauaina hopes to improve her family standard of living and her kids' education

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, bush-knives, fertilizer, file, and chemicals for her taro root crop and to pay for school fees

loans.name: Repeka

texts.en:
Repeka is a 39-year-old married woman with five children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Repeka has requested a loan to buy a pickaxe, bush-knives, backpack sprayer, file, axe and chain saw. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Repeka hopes to improve her family standard of living and to invest some in her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a pickaxe, bush-knives, backpack sprayer, file, axe, and chainsaw

loans.name: Jonathan Miguel

texts.es:
Jonathan tiene 23 años de estado civil actual unión libre tiene un hijo vive con la conyugue y el hijo en el Canton Pueblo Viejo Provincia de Los Rios.

Jonathan pertenece a la ventanilla ANCHOVETA se encuentre ubicada en la parroquia Puerto Pechiche recinto Anchoveta pertenece al Canton Pueblo Viejo se dedica a labores agricolas.

Jonathan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, arroz, soya, además se dedica a la crianza de cerdos. Las compras y las ventas las realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantres, abonos, una bomba. El credito le ayudado a suplir las necesidades de la familia y de la produccion. El sueño es sembrar cacao y comprar una casa.

Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado es el mal clima y la competencia. En los tiempos libres le gusta jugar futbool y cartas.
texts.en:
Jonathan is 23 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has one child. He lives with his partner and his son in the Pueblo Viejo canton of the Los Rios province. Jonathan belongs to the Anchoveta communal bank, which is located in the Puerto Pechiche parish of the Anchoveta district in the Pueblo Viejo canton. Anchoveta works with agricultural enterprises.

Jonathan works in agriculture, planting corn, rice, and soy. He also raises pigs. He buys his supplies and sells his products in Ventanas.

He requests the loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, and a pump. The loan will help him provide for the needs of his family and his crops.

His dream is to plant cacao and to buy a house. The challenges that he has faced include bad weather and competition. In his free time, he likes to play soccer and cards.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, and a pump.

loans.name: Patience 2 & 3 Group

texts.fr:
Paguy est le coordinateur de son groupe Patience. Il est  marie et Il a 2 enfants. Il habite dans la region nord est d'Haïti ou de électricité est rare et de l'eau portable est très limité. Il dirige son commerce de vente de sandales pendants les 5 derniers années

Avant de ce commercer ce commerce il était  une étudiant. Paguy va utiliser votre prêt pour l'achat de chaussures, sandales et le tennis. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera a grandir son commerce.  Des autres membres de Patience  ont besoin d’un  emprunt pour le commerce tel que ventes produits cosmétiques boissons gazeuses etc.  Il  dit que son défit  principal est de devenir un plus grand commerçant

Paguy  dit son but principal c’est d’avoir un plus grande commerce qui lui facilitera  à  voyagé dans des autre pays.
texts.en:
Paguy is the coordinator of the Patience group. He is married, has two children, and lives in the north-east of Haiti, where electricity is scarce and drinking water is very limited. He has had a business selling sandals for the past five years.

Before starting this business, Paguy was a student. He plans to use his loan to buy shoes, sandals and sneakers, and hopes that the loan will help him to expand his business. Other members of the Patience group need loans for their businesses, which include the sale of cosmetic products and sodas. Paguy says that his main challenge is figuring out how to be a more successful retailer. He also says that his main goal is to have a larger business, which will allow him to travel to other countries.

loans.use: To buy shoes, sandals and sneakers

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity is a 25-year-old married woman. She has a child who is two years old. She describes herself to be ambitious and determined. She operates a cereals store where she sells maize and beans. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in an urban area with high potential, and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be transport. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase beans for resale. Her business goal is to supply cereals to other towns within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase beans for resale.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is a 50-year-old single woman from Talibon, Bohol. She is engaged in farming and grows rice. She has been into farming for almost nine years.

She requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to buy fertilizers, pesticides and more rice seedlings, to yield more harvest. 

In the future, Esterlita would like to invest in other business ventures to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and more rice seedlings.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a 35-year-old married man. He has six children with ages ranging from 3 years to 13 years. He describes himself to be honest and faithful. 

He operates a grinding mill where he grinds maize and sells maize flour. He has been involved in this business for five years. His business is located in a suburban area, and his primary customers are locals. 

He will use the 20,000 Kenyan shillings loan to buy maize and fuel for the grinding machine. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy maize and fuel for the grinding machine.

loans.name: Saofai

texts.en:
Saofai is 57 years old and married with 8 children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for many years. 

Saofai has requested a loan to buy a cooler, snorkels, goggles, spears and nets for her fishing business. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Saofai will improve her business to save more money for her children's future.

loans.use: buy a cooler, snorkels, goggles, spears and nets to fish

loans.name: Vaitapu

texts.en:
Vaitapu is 43 years old and married with 5 children. She runs a small business selling coconut biscuits in her community and has been doing this for 2 years. 

Vaitapu has requested a loan to buy a kerosene oven, frying pan, flour, dripping  oil, baking soda, sugar, eggs and foil. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital.  Vaitapu will use her earnings to improve her business to earn more money and save it for her children's education.

loans.use: buy ingredients to make biscuits to sell

loans.name: Pupu

texts.en:
Pupu is a 59-year-old woman who is married with 5 children. She has a small sewing business.  Pupu is asking for a loan to help her pay for her  daughter's university fee and registration. She will also use part of the loan to buy materials, threads and needles for her sewing business.

Pupu joined SPBD in 2006 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: pay for her daughter's university fee and buy sewing supplies
